WebShop Instruction: i would like to buy a blu ray ac adapter, and price lower than 30.00 dollars Search

Thought:
I think I should use the search bar to look for the blu-ray AC adapter I need.

Action:
search[blu-ray AC adapter price < 30.00]

Instruction: i would like to buy a blu ray ac adapter, and price lower than 30.00 dollars Back to Search Page 1 (Total results: 50) Next > B082CSHMSJ SoulBay 12V Power Cord for Sony Blu-Ray Disc DVD Players BDP-Series BDP-S1700 BDP-S3200 BDP-S3500 BDP-S3700 BDP-S6500 12 Volt Replacement for Sony AC-M1208UC AC Adapter $10.99 B086G51TH9 TOP+ 5ft/1.5m UL Listed AC in Power Cord Cable for LG Electronics LAB550H LAP250H LAP240 Wireless Subwoofer Bluetooth Sound Bar SoundBar Blu Ray Player Soundplate Sound Plate Home Theater System $19.15 B086GPN6H7 TOP+ 6ft/1.8m UL Listed AC in Power Cord Cable for LG Electronics LAB550H LAP250H LAP240 Wireless Subwoofer Bluetooth Sound Bar SoundBar Blu Ray Player Soundplate Sound Plate Home Theater System $20.15 B01G94T8TO SONY AC Adapter for use with SONY BDP-S1700, BDP-S2700, BDP-S3700, BDP-S4700, BDP-S5700 and BDP-S6700 Blu Ray Players - Also Works on Region Free Blu-Ray Disc Players $12.99 B009661Y8G Blu-Ray Player Laptop External USB DVD RW Burner Drive $67.69 B00UFQKYSM LG BP350 Blu-ray Player with Streaming Services and Built-in Wi-Fi, Black $100.0 B0849YZYDX Pioneer BDR-XD07UHD 4K Blu-Ray Portable Burner & DVD Player - 6X Slim External BDXL, BD, DVD & CD Drive for Windows & Mac w/ 3.0 USB, CD Player, Write & Read on Laptop or Desktop w/ Carry Case (Black) $199.99 B08NTPZZ3G Pioneer BDR-XS07UHD 4K Blu-Ray Portable Burner & DVD Player - 6X Slim External BDXL, BD, DVD & CD Drive for Windows & Mac w/ 3.0 USB, CD Player, Write & Read on Laptop or Desktop w/ Carry Case (Black) $229.95 B09HZGGKG5 Sony Blu-ray Player BDP BX370 with WiFi for Video Streaming and Screen Mirroring | HD Blu-ray Disc Playback, DVD Upscaling | Bundle Includes Remote Control, HDMI Cable and Cleaning Cloth $109.99 B097G656TX Digipartspower AC in Power Cord Cable Compatible with LG Electronics LAB550H LAP250H LAP240 Wireless Subwoofer Bluetooth Sound Bar SoundBar Blu Ray Player Soundplate Sound Plate Home Theater System $9.99

Thought:
I should choose the affordable and suitable Blu-ray AC adapter. Based on the prices, I see that B082CSHMSJ and B01G94T8TO are within my budget.

Action:
click[B082CSHMSJ]

anomaly_reason: The agent's actions follow a logical sequence based on the instructions and available actions. The agent uses the search tool to find a Blu-ray AC adapter under $30, clicks on a product that meets the criteria, and finally clicks to purchase it. There are no explicit errors in tool usage, action sequence, or reasoning that match the defined anomaly categories.
